<title level="1" right="Trait">[Ghost](/Traits.aspx?ID=217)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 346</row>

Lost souls that haunt the world as incorporeal undead are called ghosts.
name: Ghost
